The two vehicles seek to transform this appearance through the cognition of added effort, and when they reach the path of liberation in the stage of post-learner, they directly realize liberation, completely without various discriminating thoughts.

After emerging from the path of liberation, the worldly concentrated mind again takes as its object what was attained.
